description:
Komugi has traveled to the distant mountains in pursuit of a monster. In her exhausted state, she arrives at a hot spring inn. By coincidence, Kokona, Tsukasa, and Yuto are also there filming. Komugi decides to stay the night at the inn with her friends. Yuto, who believes Tsukasa likes Kokona, tries to help close the distance between Tsukasa and Kokona over the trip. Meanwhile, Tanu-P and Neko-P begin to suspect that Komugi is a Tombo-E Girl...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 優斗, 恋のからまわり
